subject: Handle With Care
text:
Girl, for a long time we've been together 
this is how I truly feel 
As far as me leaving—never 
because the way I feel is so real 
you've always been in my corner 
through thick and thin 
you knew just when to lift me up 
when I was down 
Girl you knew just what to do 
that's why even if I don't 
wake-up in the morning, I love you 
because there's nobody else in this world 
Who can take me away from you 
So even if I don't wake-up in the morning 
I love you, even if I never told you, yes I do 
Because nobody else in this world 
can take me away from you oh, no, no
